-- | Helper class for passing context along a predicate value
--   
--   Helper class for passing context along a predicate value Used as a
--   helper in queryparser
@package predicate-class
@version 0.1.0.1

module Data.Predicate.Class
class Predicate p
(&&) :: Predicate p => p -> p -> p
(||) :: Predicate p => p -> p -> p
not :: Predicate p => p -> p
instance Data.Predicate.Class.Predicate GHC.Types.Bool
instance Data.Predicate.Class.Predicate p => Data.Predicate.Class.Predicate (a -> p)
